text-node.description: BazaarvoiceData-ExportProductCatalog =========================== Starting point for the job to export catalog data to Bazaarvoice. This export contains product data that is displayed on the review landing page, submission form and microsite.

BazzarvoiceData-ExportPurchaseData ========================= Starting point to the job that exports and delivers purchase data to Bazaarvoice to use for Post Interaction Emails that generate additional review volume.

BazaarvoiceData-Reset ================ Clears all inline rating data, resets order 'sent in PPE feed' flags, and removes all SEO content files. This is for testing only, and should never be used in a production environment. This tool was devloped for legacy inline ratings and legacy SEO imports, so it will not be useful to most Conversations 2013 merchants.

BazaarvoiceData-ResetOrder =================== This job will reset the 'sent in PPE feed' attribute on all orders to false. This is a tool for testing only, and should never be used in a production environment.
Support the integration framework and regular scheduled jobs. If the framework is in use, let it send the notifications.
Support the integration framework and regular scheduled jobs. If the framework is in use, let it send the notifications.

BazaarvoiceData-SetLocalizedObjectList =========================== Helper pipeline used by ExportProductCatalog whenever we have multiple locales mapped on the BV side. Based on the locale mapping site preference, this gathers the locale specific data for each product and category.

BazaarvoiceData-GetLocalizedOrders =========================== Helper pipeline used by ExportPurchaseData whenever we have multiple locales mapped on the BV side. Using the locale mapping site preference, this gathers the locale specific order data based on the locale of the order.
